name: Eesha Krupa Building
clue: This is the only apartment in Rambaug Lane 1 near Kotak Mahindra Bank that hasn't gone under redevelopment. The building is named after a famous Indian actress who played in Jannat2

name: Chicken Ghar
clue: This place has the best view of the sunrise in the entire city of kalyan.

name: Madhurima Sweets
clue: This place is famous for its sweets and is located near Rambaug 4.

name: Maxi Ground
clue: This place is famous for its cricket ground and is located near Rambaug.

name: Kala Talav Entry Gate
clue: This place is famous for its lake and is located near Rambaug, entry gate.

name: Mangya Shop
clue: This place is behind Kala Talav and is famous for its cigarettes and is located near Rambaug.

name: Gateway of India
clue: A famous monument where the last British troops departed from India.

name: Marine Drive
clue: This curved coastal road resembles a string of pearls when viewed at night from above.

name: Juhu Beach
clue: A popular beach known for its street food and celebrity homes nearby.

name: Siddhi Vinayak Temple
clue: One of the most visited temples in Mumbai dedicated to Lord Ganesha.

name: The Bouganvillea View Hotel
clue: Bouganvillea view hotel is a popular place for tourists, situated on the Jogiwara Road.

name: Bougainvillia, McLeod Ganj, Dharamshala - 176200, Himachal Pradesh, India

clue: The BouganVillea View Hotel Rooftop is a popular place for tourists, situated on the Jogiwara Road.

name: Green View Guest House, Jogiwara Road, McLeod Ganj, Dharamshala - 176200, Himachal Pradesh, India
clue: This is the Guest House with a color name and a view of the mountains in the Jogiwara Road.

name: Bogdo Cafe
clue: This cafe is famour for its delicious food and is located on the Jogiwara Road and is called Bogdo Cafe.

name: Bouganvillea rooftop Hot place
clue: This is the only place in bouganvillea rooftop where fellows cowork and is a hotspace

name: Space Needle
clue:
This is Seattle’s most iconic climb. Conquer all 832 open-air steps to reach the top.
The view is legendary — so is the name.
What’s the name of this towering place?

name: Pike's Place, Market
clue:
It opened its doors in 1907 and never looked back.
Overlooking Elliott Bay, it's the soul of Seattle's market.
Where fish fly and farmers thrive,
This market’s been alive and buzzing for over a century.
What’s the name of this iconic gathering place?

name: The Spheres by Amazon.com
clue:
In the heart of the city, a jungle thrives indoors.
With 40,000 plants from 30+ countries, it restores.
A workplace reimagined, where nature leads the way —
Glass orbs where green and innovation stay.
What’s the name of this living, breathing workspace?
